overview: Collection of two short films from Falcon Studios. "Upperclassman" — Handsome Mark Perry has the hots for student Brian Reed. These two studs take up an agenda of their own as they explore each others manliness. Wide-eyed freshman Luke witnesses them literally tabling their emotions and is drawn into the action. "Cellblock" — Prisoner Mike Cole is teased, used and pleased by hot jailer Hal Drake. Nightsticks and copcock make this weekend lockup an experience to remember.
title: Upperclassman
